name: Mongo JDBC Driver
short_description: This project builds upon the MongoDB Java driver to provide a limited JDBC implementation to allow graphical tools such as SQuirreL SQL Client to visualize and manipulate MongoDB collections and documents.  It will accept an SQL-like syntax for CRUD operations, where "tables" represent MongoDB collections, and rows are individual documents within a collection.  Each row has two columns (ObjectId and Document).
summary: A minimal JDBC driver implementation for MongoDB
